member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.BaseChart`4.SetOptions(`2)
member.summary: Sets the chart's options manually. Must call Update after making this call. If the options changes AspectRatio must also call Resize after Update.
member.param: New chart options used though OptionsJsonString or OptionsObject will supersede.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.BaseChart`4.SetOptionsObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the chart's manually. Must call after manging this call. If the options changes AspectRatio must also call after .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.BaseChart`4.Resize
member.summary: Manually resize the canvas element. This is run each time the canvas container is resized, but you can call this method manually if you change the size of the canvas nodes container element. Should also be called when updating the aspect ratio.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.BaseChart`4.ChangeType(Blazorise.Charts.ChartType)
member.summary: Destroy the current chart instance and recreates it by using the same data and options.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.BaseChart`4.Destroy
member.summary: Destroys the chart instance. Calling this method should generally dispose of any chart resources.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.Base
member.summary: Base value for the bar in data units along the value axis. If not set, defaults to the value axis base value.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.BarPercentage
member.summary: Percent (0-1) of the available width each bar should be within the category width. 1.0 will take the whole category width and put the bars right next to each other.

summary.para: If this value is a number, it is applied to the width of each bar, in pixels. When this is enforced, barPercentage and categoryPercentage are ignored.

If set to 'flex', the base sample widths are calculated automatically based on the previous and following samples so that they take the full available widths without overlap. Then, bars are sized using barPercentage and categoryPercentage. There is no gap when the percentage options are 1. This mode generates bars with different widths when data are not evenly spaced.

If not set (default), the base sample widths are calculated using the smallest interval that prevents bar overlapping, and bars are sized using barPercentage and categoryPercentage. This mode always generates bars equally sized.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.BorderSkipped
member.summary:
This setting is used to avoid drawing the bar stroke at the base of the fill, or disable the border radius. In general, this does not need to be changed except when creating chart types that derive from a bar chart.
"start"
"end"
"middle" (only valid on stacked bars: the borders between bars are skipped)
"bottom"
"left"
"top"
"right"
false

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.BorderRadius
member.summary: If this value is a number, it is applied to all corners of the rectangle (topLeft, topRight, bottomLeft, bottomRight), except corners touching the borderSkipped. If this value is an object, the topLeft property defines the top-left corners border radius. Similarly, the topRight, bottomLeft, and bottomRight properties can also be specified. Omitted corners and those touching the borderSkipped are skipped. For example if the top border is skipped, the border radius for the corners topLeft and topRight will be skipped as well.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.CategoryPercentage
member.summary: Percent (0-1) of the available width each category should be within the sample width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.Grouped
member.summary: Should the bars be grouped on index axis. When true, all the datasets at same index value will be placed next to each other centering on that index value. When false, each bar is placed on its actual index-axis value.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.HoverBackgroundColor
member.summary: The bar background color when hovered.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.HoverBorderColor
member.summary: The bar border color when hovered.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.HoverBorderWidth
member.summary: The bar border width when hovered (in pixels).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.HoverBorderRadius
member.summary: The bar border radius when hovered (in pixels).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.IndexAxis
member.summary: The base axis of the dataset. 'x' for vertical bars and 'y' for horizontal bars.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.InflateAmount
member.summary: This option can be used to inflate the rects that are used to draw the bars. This can be used to hide artifacts between bars when barPercentage(#barpercentage) * categoryPercentage(#categorypercentage) is 1. The default value 'auto' should work in most cases.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.MaxBarThickness
member.summary: Set this to ensure that bars are not sized thicker than this.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.MinBarLength
member.summary: Set this to ensure that bars have a minimum length in pixels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.PointStyle
member.summary: Style of the point for legend. https://www.chartjs.org/docs/latest/configuration/elements.html#point-styles

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.SkipNull
member.summary: If true, null or undefined values will not be used for spacing calculations when determining bar size.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.Stack
member.summary: The ID of the group to which this dataset belongs to (when stacked, each group will be a separate stack). Defaults to dataset type.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.XAxisID
member.summary: The ID of the x-axis to plot this dataset on.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartDataset`1.YAxisID
member.summary: The ID of the y-axis to plot this dataset on.

member.summary: Style of the point.

member.summary: The drawing order of dataset. Also affects order for stacking, tooltip and legend.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartDataset`1.Hidden
member.summary: Configure the visibility of the dataset. Using Hidden = true will hide the dataset from being rendered in the Chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.Stack
member.summary: The ID of the group to which this dataset belongs to (when stacked, each group will be a separate stack). Defaults to dataset type.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.BorderCapStyle
member.summary:
Cap style of the line. See MDN.
"butt" The ends of lines are squared off at the endpoints. Default value.
"round" The ends of lines are rounded.
"square" The ends of lines are squared off by adding a box with an equal width and half the height of the line's thickness.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.BorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of dashes. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.BorderDashOffset
member.summary: Offset for line dashes. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.BorderJoinStyle
member.summary: Line joint style. See MDN.

summary.para: The following interpolation modes are supported.

item.description: The 'default' algorithm uses a custom weighted cubic interpolation, which produces pleasant curves for all types of datasets.

The 'monotone' algorithm is more suited to y = f(x) datasets: it preserves monotonicity (or piecewise monotonicity) of the dataset being interpolated, and ensures local extremums (if any) stay at input data points.

summary.para: If left untouched (undefined), the global options.elements.line.cubicInterpolationMode property is used.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.Fill
member.summary: Fill the area under the line. See area charts..

member.summary: The fill color for points.

member.summary: The border color for points.

member.summary: The width of the point border in pixels.

member.summary: The pixel size of the non-displayed point that reacts to mouse events.

member.summary: Point background color when hovered.

member.summary: Point border color when hovered.

member.summary: Border width of point when hovered.

member.summary: The radius of the point when hovered.

member.summary: The radius of the point shape. If set to 0, the point is not rendered.

member.summary: The radius of the point shape. If set to 0, the point is not rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.PointStyle
member.summary: Style of the point.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.ShowLine
member.summary: If false, the line is not drawn for this dataset.

summary.para: Line segment styles can be overridden by scriptable options in the segment object. Currently all of the border* and backgroundColor options are supported. The segment styles are resolved for each section of the line between each point. undefined fallbacks to main line styles.

item.description: index of first point in the data array
index of second point in the data array

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.SpanGaps
member.summary: If true, lines will be drawn between points with no or null data. If false, points with null data will create a break in the line. Can also be a number specifying the maximum gap length to span. The unit of the value depends on the scale used.

summary.para: If the line is shown as a stepped line.
If the stepped value is set to anything other than false, tension will be ignored.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.Tension
member.summary: Bezier curve tension of the line. Set to 0 to draw straightlines. This option is ignored if monotone cubic interpolation is used.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.XAxisID
member.summary: The ID of the x-axis to plot this dataset on.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartDataset`1.YAxisID
member.summary: The ID of the y-axis to plot this dataset on.

summary.para: The following values are supported for borderAlign.

item.description: The borders of arcs next to each other will overlap (default).
It is guaranteed that all borders will not overlap.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartDataset`1.BorderRadius
member.summary: If this value is a number, it is applied to all corners of the arc (outerStart, outerEnd, innerStart, innerRight). If this value is an object, the outerStart property defines the outer-start corner's border radius. Similarly, the outerEnd, innerStart, and innerEnd properties can also be specified.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartDataset`1.Circumference
member.summary: Per-dataset override for the sweep that the arcs cover.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartDataset`1.Spacing
member.summary: Fixed arc offset (in pixels). Similar to offset but applies to all arcs.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartDataset`1.Weight
member.summary: The relative thickness of the dataset. Providing a value for weight will cause the pie or doughnut dataset to be drawn with a thickness relative to the sum of all the dataset weight values.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.IBaseChart

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1
member.summary: Represents an object that can be either a single value or an array of values. This is used for type safe js-interop.
member.typeparam: The type of data this is supposed to hold.

member.name: F:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.PropertyName
member.summary: The compile-time name of the property which gets the wrapped value. This is used internally for serialization.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of which represents a single value.
member.param: The single value this should represent.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.#ctor(`0[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of which represents an array of values.
member.param: The array of values this should represent.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.op_Implicit(`0)~Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0}
member.summary: Implicitly wraps a single value of to a new instance of .

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.op_Implicit(`0[])~Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0}
member.summary: Implicitly wraps an array of values of to a new instance of .
member.param: The array of values to wrap

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.op_Equality(Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0},Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0})
member.summary: Determines whether two specified instances contain the same value.
member.returns: true if the value of a is the same as the value of b; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.op_Inequality(Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0},Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0})
member.summary: Determines whether two specified instances contain different values.
member.returns: true if the value of a is different from the value of b; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.Equals(Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption{`0})
member.summary: Determines whether the specified instance is considered equal to the current instance.
member.returns: true if the objects are considered equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object instance is considered equal to the current instance.
member.returns: true if the objects are considered equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash of the underlying object.
member.returns: The hash of the underlying object.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.IsIndexed
member.summary:
Gets the value indicating whether the option wrapped in this is indexed.
True if the wrapped value represents an array of , false if it represents a single value of .

member.summary: The indexed values represented by this instance.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.IndexableOption`1.SingleValue
member.summary: The single value represented by this instance.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAnimation

member.summary: The number of milliseconds an animation takes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAnimation.Easing
member.summary: Easing function to use. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Delay before starting the animations.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAnimation.Loop
member.summary: If set to true, the animations loop endlessly.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements
member.summary: Arcs are used in the polar area, doughnut and pie charts.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.Angle
member.summary: Arc angle to cover. Polar only.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Arc fill color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.BorderAlign
member.summary: Arc stroke alignment.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.BorderColor
member.summary: Arc stroke color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.BorderJoinStyle
member.summary: Line join style. See MDN. The default is 'round' when borderAlign is 'inner'.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.BorderWidth
member.summary: Arc stroke width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartArcElements.Circular
member.summary: By default the Arc is curved. If circular: false the Arc will be flat.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis
member.summary: Common options to all axes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Type
member.summary: Type of scale being employed. Custom scales can be created and registered with a string key. This allows changing the type of an axis for a chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.AlignToPixels
member.summary: Align pixel values to device pixels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Display
member.summary: Controls the axis global visibility (visible when true, hidden when false). When display: "auto", the axis is visible only if at least one associated dataset is visible.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Grid
member.summary: Grid line configuration. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Min
member.summary: User defined minimum number for the scale, overrides minimum value from data. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Max
member.summary: User defined maximum number for the scale, overrides maximum value from data. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Reverse
member.summary: Reverse the scale.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Stacked
member.summary: Should the data be stacked.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.SuggestedMax
member.summary: Adjustment used when calculating the maximum data value. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.SuggestedMin
member.summary: Adjustment used when calculating the minimum data value. more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Ticks
member.summary: Tick configuration.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Time
member.summary: Time configuration.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Weight
member.summary: The weight used to sort the axis. Higher weights are further away from the chart area.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Title
member.summary: Defines options for the scale title. Note that this only applies to cartesian axes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.BeginAtZero
member.summary: If true, scale will include 0 if it is not already included.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxis.Grace
member.summary: Percentage (string ending with %) or amount (number) for added room in the scale range above and below data.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine
member.summary: The grid line configuration is nested under the scale configuration in the gridLines key. It defines options for the grid lines that run perpendicular to the axis.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.BorderColor
member.summary: The color of the border line.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.BorderWidth
member.summary: The width of the border line.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.BorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of dashes on grid lines

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.BorderDashOffset
member.summary: Offset for line dashes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.Circular
member.summary: If true, gridlines are circular (on radar chart only).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.Color
member.summary: The color of the grid lines. If specified as an array, the first color applies to the first grid line, the second to the second grid line, and so on.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.Display
member.summary: If false, do not display grid lines for this axis.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.DrawBorder
member.summary: If true, draw border at the edge between the axis and the chart area.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.DrawOnChartArea
member.summary: If true, draw lines on the chart area inside the axis lines. This is useful when there are multiple axes and you need to control which grid lines are drawn.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.DrawTicks
member.summary: If true, draw lines beside the ticks in the axis area beside the chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.LineWidth
member.summary: Stroke width of grid lines.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.Offset
member.summary: If true, grid lines will be shifted to be between labels. This is set to true for a bar chart by default.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.TickBorderDash
member.summary: Length and spacing of the tick mark line. If not set, defaults to the grid line borderDash value.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.TickBorderDashOffset
member.summary: Offset for the line dash of the tick mark. If unset, defaults to the grid line borderDashOffset value

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.TickColor
member.summary: Color of the tick line. If unset, defaults to the grid line color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.TickLength
member.summary: Length in pixels that the grid lines will draw into the axis area.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.TickWidth
member.summary: Width of the tick mark in pixels. If unset, defaults to the grid line width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisGridLine.Z
member.summary: z-index of gridline layer. Values <= 0 are drawn under datasets, > 0 on top.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisMajorTick
member.summary: The majorTick configuration is nested under the ticks configuration in the major key. It defines options for the major tick marks that are generated by the axis. Omitted options are inherited from ticks configuration. These options are disabled by default.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisMajorTick.Enabled
member.summary: If true, major tick options are used to show major ticks.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel
member.summary: Defines options for the scale title.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.Display
member.summary: If true, display the axis title.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.LabelString
member.summary: The text for the title. (i.e. "# of People" or "Response Choices").

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.LineHeight
member.summary: Height of an individual line of text (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/line-height).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.FontColor
member.summary: Font color for scale title.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.FontFamily
member.summary: Font family for the scale title, follows CSS font-family options.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.FontSize
member.summary: Font size for scale title.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.FontStyle
member.summary: Font style for the scale title, follows CSS font-style options (i.e. normal, italic, oblique, initial, inherit).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisScaleLabel.Padding
member.summary: Padding to apply around scale labels. Only top and bottom are implemented.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks
member.summary: Common tick options to all axes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.BackdropColor
member.summary: Color of label backdrops.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.BackdropPadding
member.summary: Padding of label backdrop. See Padding.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Callback
member.summary: Defines the Expression which will be converted to JavaScript as a string representation of the tick value as it should be displayed on the chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Display
member.summary: If true, show tick marks.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Color
member.summary: Color of ticks.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Font
member.summary: Font color for tick labels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Major
member.summary: Major ticks configuration. Omitted options are inherited from options above.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Padding
member.summary: Sets the offset of the tick labels from the axis.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.ShowLabelBackdrop
member.summary: If true, draw a background behind the tick labels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.TextStrokeColor
member.summary: The color of the stroke around the text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.TextStrokeWidth
member.summary: Stroke width around the text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Z
member.summary: z-index of tick layer. Useful when ticks are drawn on chart area. Values <= 0 are drawn under datasets, > 0 on top.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Count
member.summary: The number of ticks to generate. If specified, this overrides the automatic generation.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Format
member.summary: The number format options used by the default label formatter.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.Precision
member.summary: If defined and is not specified, the step size will be rounded to this many decimal places.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTicks.StepSize
member.summary: User-defined fixed step size for the scale.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime
member.summary: Common time options to all axes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.DisplayFormat
member.summary: Sets how different time units are displayed.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.IsoWeekday
member.summary: If boolean and true and the unit is set to 'week', then the first day of the week will be Monday. Otherwise, it will be Sunday. If number, the index of the first day of the week (0 - Sunday, 6 - Saturday)

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.Parser
member.summary: Custom parser for dates.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.Round
member.summary: If defined, dates will be rounded to the start of this unit. See Time Units section below for details.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.Unit
member.summary: If defined, will force the unit to be a certain type. See Time Units section below for details.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.StepSize
member.summary: The number of units between grid lines.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTime.MinUnit
member.summary: The minimum display format to be used for a time unit.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartAxisTimeDisplayFormat
member.summary: Display formats for time options.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements
member.summary: Bar elements are used to represent the bars in a bar chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Bar fill color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.BorderWidth
member.summary: Bar stroke width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.BorderColor
member.summary: Bar stroke color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.BorderSkipped
member.summary: Skipped (excluded) border: 'start', 'end', 'middle', 'bottom', 'left', 'top', 'right' or false.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.BorderRadius
member.summary: The bar border radius (in pixels).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.InflateAmount
member.summary: The amount of pixels to inflate the bar rectangle(s) when drawing.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartBarElements.PointStyle
member.summary: Style of the point for legend.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartDecimation.Enabled
member.summary: s decimation enabled?

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartDecimation.Algorithm
member.summary: Decimation algorithm to use. See more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartDecimation.Samples
member.summary: If the lttb algorithm is used, this is the number of samples in the output dataset. Defaults to the canvas width to pick 1 sample per pixel.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartDecimation.Threshold
member.summary: If the number of samples in the current axis range is above this value, the decimation will be triggered. Defaults to 4 times the canvas width. The number of point after decimation can be higher than the Threshold value.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartElements
member.summary: Point elements are used to represent the points in a line, radar or bubble chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartElements.Point
member.summary: Point elements are used to represent the points in a line, radar or bubble chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartElements.Line
member.summary: Line elements are used to represent the line in a line chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartElements.Bar
member.summary: Bar elements are used to represent the bars in a bar chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartElements.Arc
member.summary: Arcs are used in the polar area, doughnut and pie charts.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont
member.summary: Defines the font styles.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont.Family
member.summary: Default font family for all text, follows CSS font-family options.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont.Size
member.summary: Default font size (in px) for text. Does not apply to radialLinear scale point labels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont.Style
member.summary: Default font style. Does not apply to tooltip title or footer. Does not apply to chart title. Follows CSS font-style options (i.e. normal, italic, oblique, initial, inherit).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont.Weight
member.summary: Default font weight (boldness). See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartFont.LineHeight
member.summary: Height of an individual line of text. See MDN.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartInteractions
member.summary: To configure which events trigger chart interactions.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartInteractions.Mode
member.summary: Sets which elements appear in the interaction.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartInteractions.Intersect
member.summary: If true, the interaction mode only applies when the mouse position intersects an item on the chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartInteractions.Axis
member.summary: Can be set to 'x', 'y', or 'xy' to define which directions are used in calculating distances. Defaults to 'x' for 'index' mode and 'xy' in dataset and 'nearest' modes.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLayout
member.summary: The global options for the chart layout is defined in Chart.defaults.layout.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLayout.AutoPadding
member.summary: Apply automatic padding so visible elements are completely drawn.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLayout.Padding
member.summary: The padding to add inside the chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Display
member.summary: Is the legend shown.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Position
member.summary: Position of the legend.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Align
member.summary: Alignment of the legend.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.MaxHeight
member.summary: Maximum height of the legend, in pixels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.MaxWidth
member.summary: Maximum width of the legend, in pixels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.FullSize
member.summary: Marks that this box should take the full width/height of the canvas (moving other boxes). This is unlikely to need to be changed in day-to-day use.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Reverse
member.summary: Legend will show datasets in reverse order.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Labels
member.summary: Options to change legend labels.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Rtl
member.summary: true for rendering the legends from right to left.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.TextDirection
member.summary: This will force the text direction 'rtl' or 'ltr' on the canvas for rendering the legend, regardless of the css specified on the canvas.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegend.Title
member.summary: Options to change legend title.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel
member.summary: Legend Label Configuration.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.BoxWidth
member.summary: Width of coloured box.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.BoxHeight
member.summary: Height of the coloured box.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.Color
member.summary: Color of label and the strikethrough.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.Font
member.summary: Font of the label.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.Padding
member.summary: Padding between rows of colored boxes.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.PointStyle
member.summary: If specified, this style of point is used for the legend. Only used if usePointStyle is true.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.TextAlign
member.summary: Horizontal alignment of the label text. Options are: 'left', 'right' or 'center'.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendLabel.UsePointStyle
member.summary: Label style will match corresponding point style (size is based on the minimum value between boxWidth and font.size).

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle
member.summary: Legend Title Configuration.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle.Color
member.summary: Color of the text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle.Display
member.summary: Is the legend title displayed.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle.Font
member.summary: Font of the text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle.Padding
member.summary: Padding around the title.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLegendTitle.Text
member.summary: The string title.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements
member.summary: Line elements are used to represent the line in a line chart.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.Tension
member.summary: Bzier curve tension (0 for no Bzier curves).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Line fill color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderWidth
member.summary: Line stroke width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderColor
member.summary: Line stroke color.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderCapStyle
member.summary: Line cap style. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderDash
member.summary: Line dash. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderDashOffset
member.summary: Line dash offset. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.BorderJoinStyle
member.summary: Line join style. See MDN.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.CapBezierPoints
member.summary: true to keep Bzier control inside the chart, false for no restriction.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.CubicInterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode to apply. See more...

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.Fill
member.summary: How to fill the area under the line. See area charts.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartLineElements.Stepped
member.summary: true to show the line as a stepped line (tension will be ignored).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartOptions.Responsive
member.summary: Resizes the chart canvas when its container does.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartOptions.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: Maintain the original canvas aspect ratio (width / height) when resizing.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartOptions.AspectRatio
member.summary: Canvas aspect ratio (i.e. width / height, a value of 1 representing a square canvas). Note that this option is ignored if the height is explicitly defined either as attribute or via the style.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartOptions.ResizeDelay
member.summary: Delay the resize update by give amount of milliseconds. This can ease the resize process by debouncing update of the elements.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartOptions.Locale
member.summary: A string with a BCP 47 language tag, leveraging on INTL NumberFormat

member.summary: Alignment of the axis title. Possible options are 'start', 'center' and 'end'.

member.summary: Color of label.

member.summary: Font of the label.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartScaleTitle.Padding
member.summary: Padding to apply around scale labels. Only top, bottom and y are implemented.

member.name: T:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips
member.summary: Tooltip Configuration

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Enabled
member.summary: Are on-canvas tooltips enabled.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Mode
member.summary: Sets which elements appear in the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Intersect
member.summary: If true, the tooltip mode applies only when the mouse position intersects with an element. If false, the mode will be applied at all times.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Position
member.summary: The mode for positioning the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color of the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TitleColor
member.summary: Color of title text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TitleFont
member.summary: See Fonts.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TitleAlign
member.summary: Horizontal alignment of the title text lines.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TitleSpacing
member.summary: Spacing to add to top and bottom of each title line.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TitleMarginBottom
member.summary: Margin to add on bottom of title section.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BodyColor
member.summary: Color of body text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BodyFont
member.summary: See Fonts.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BodyAlign
member.summary: Horizontal alignment of the body text lines.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BodySpacing
member.summary: Spacing to add to top and bottom of each tooltip item.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.FooterColor
member.summary: Color of footer text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.FooterFont
member.summary: See Fonts.

member.summary: Horizontal alignment of the footer text lines.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.FooterSpacing
member.summary: Spacing to add to top and bottom of each footer line.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.FooterMarginTop
member.summary: Margin to add before drawing the footer.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Padding
member.summary: Padding inside the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.CaretPadding
member.summary: Extra distance to move the end of the tooltip arrow away from the tooltip point.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.CaretSize
member.summary: Size, in px, of the tooltip arrow.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.CornerRadius
member.summary: Radius of tooltip corner curves.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.MultiKeyBackground
member.summary: Color to draw behind the colored boxes when multiple items are in the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.DisplayColors
member.summary: If true, color boxes are shown in the tooltip.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BoxWidth
member.summary: Width of the color box if displayColors is true.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BoxHeight
member.summary: Height of the color box if displayColors is true.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BoxPadding
member.summary: Padding between the color box and the text.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.UsePointStyle
member.summary: Use the corresponding point style (from dataset options) instead of color boxes, ex: star, triangle etc. (size is based on the minimum value between boxWidth and boxHeight).

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BorderColor
member.summary: Color of the border.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.BorderWidth
member.summary: Size of the border.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.Rtl
member.summary: true for rendering the tooltip from right to left.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.TextDirection
member.summary: This will force the text direction 'rtl' or 'ltr on the canvas for rendering the tooltips, regardless of the css specified on the canvas

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.XAlign
member.summary:
Position of the tooltip caret in the X direction.
"left" (default)
"center"
"right"

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.ChartTooltips.YAlign
member.summary:
Position of the tooltip caret in the Y direction.
"left" (default)
"center"
"right"

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartOptions.BarPercentage
member.summary: Percent (0-1) of the available width each bar should be within the category width. 1.0 will take the whole category width and put the bars right next to each other.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.BarChartOptions.CategoryPercentage
member.summary: Percent (0-1) of the available width each category should be within the sample width.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.DoughnutChartOptions.CutoutPercentage
member.summary: The percentage of the chart that is cut out of the middle.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartOptions.ShowLines
member.summary: If false, the lines between points are not drawn.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.LineChartOptions.SpanGaps
member.summary: If false, NaN data causes a break in the line.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartOptions.CutoutPercentage
member.summary: The percentage of the chart that is cut out of the middle.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartOptions.Rotation
member.summary: Starting angle to draw arcs from.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PieChartOptions.Circumference
member.summary: Sweep to allow arcs to cover.

member.name: P:Blazorise.Charts.PolarAreaChartOptions.StartAngle
member.summary: Starting angle to draw arcs for the first item in a dataset.
